oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sneezing in the early morning considered to be unfortunate. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V. 21. 5654 rev. and 5655 rev., note). How to destroy a Sneeze. (L V.-22. 5658 rev., note). Sneezing drives away the game. The action or ritual called kkoroken is used to abort a sneeze. 1) Dia!kwain heard this from his parents and also experienced it in person, 2) See also The Moon, not to be looked at, when game is shot and Sneezing: to be avoided when game is shot, 3) This story is found in Book V-21.
